lastfm.summary: "Fly Like an Eagle" is a song written by Steve Miller on the album Fly Like an Eagle. The song went to number 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart during the week of January 8, 1977. The single edit can be found on Greatest Hits (1974â€“1978). The song has an unusually mellow and "dreamy" feel. It is usually played in tandem with "Space Intro". An earlier 1973 version of the song features a more bluesy and less funk-inspired rhythm, and guitar taking the synthesizer parts (albeit with similar delay effects). Read more on Last.fm.
